```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

This blog posts information and shot analysis of COVID-19 situations and vaccination status in multiple countries around the world, including daily and cumulative confirmed cases, daily and total tests conducted, and vaccination status of the local population etc.

Data description, tables, plots, analysis and data stories can all be found in posts or related sections on navigation bar in this blog. Dataset used in this blog was retrieved on 1 September 2021, all data was updated until 31 August 2021. Detailed data description can be found in [Data Description](https://etc5523-2021.github.io/blog-xwan0274/posts/2021-09-01-data-description/).

Ownership of the data is held by [Our World in Data](https://ourworldindata.org/coronavirus/country/chile), and this blog is owned by the author specified.
